entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Clearwater
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:46 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clearwater 6:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: WSW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
